context_for_next_testing_agent: Slide transition animations verified working. Key implementation: slideKey state increments on every navigation (button click, swipe, auto-rotate) which forces React re-render and triggers the CSS animation. slideDir ref tracks direction (+1 for next, -1 for prev) to apply correct animation (slide-left for forward, slide-right for backward). Animation timing: 0.35s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94).
